Title: Relates to requiring direct air capture products in cement and concrete used in state projects; creates a tax credit for using direct air capture
Summary: Relates to requiring direct air capture products in cement and concrete used in state projects; creates a tax credit for using direct air capture.
LawCode: Amd §165, St Fin L; amd §§210-B & 606, Tax L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law and the tax law, in relation to requiring direct air capture products in cement and concrete used in state projects; creates a tax credit for using direct air capture
